mapper.sql: id , avg_score, key_words, tip, interview_url, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interview_history (avg_score, key_words, tip, interview_url, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) VALUES (#{entity.avgScore}, #{entity.keyWords}, #{entity.tip}, #{entity.interviewUrl}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted})

INSERT INTO interview_history ( avg_score, key_words, tip, interview_url, created_by, created_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted ) VALUES
( #{item.avgScore}, #{item.keyWords}, #{item.tip}, #{item.interviewUrl}, #{item.createdBy}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.updateBy}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.isDeleted} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE interview_history
avg_score = #{entity.avgScore},
key_words = #{entity.keyWords},
tip = #{entity.tip},
interview_url = #{entity.interviewUrl},
created_by = #{entity.createdBy},
created_time = #{entity.createdTime},
update_by = #{entity.updateBy},
update_time = #{entity.updateTime},
is_deleted = #{entity.isDeleted}
WHERE id = #{entity.id}
